markdownRemark.excerpt: Jordan and Ryan continue investigating the Heritage Minute PSAs, and Jordan discovers the true nature of Canadian history.
markdownRemark.html:
Jordan and Ryan continue investigating the Heritage Minute PSAs, and Jordan discovers the true nature of Canadian history.

I built my Heritage Minute Playlist(tinyurl.com/y4qm7nov) using these articles by Justin McElroy (not the one from www.themcelroy.family/)

  • The 10 Best Canadian Heritage Minutes of All Time(tinyurl.com/y5vmtzyv)
  • Ranking Every Canadian Heritage Minute: #25-11(tinyurl.com/y5wjvjvw)

Thanks to The Motorleague(www.themotorleague.ca/) for our theme song “North America”!
